dataset_id: BOREAS RSS-07 Landsat TM LAI Images of the SSA and NSA
title: BOREAS RSS-07 Landsat TM LAI Images of the SSA and NSA
summary: The BOREAS RSS-07 team used Landsat TM images processed at CCRS to produce images of LAI for the BOREAS study areas.  Two images acquired on June 6 and August 9, 1991 were used for the SSA, and one image acquired on June 9, 1994 was used for the NSA.  The LAI images are based on ground measurements and Landsat TM RSR images.

citation: Schaudt, K. 2000. An approach to deriving roughness length and zero-plane displacement height from satellite data, prototyped with BOREAS data. Agricultural and Forest Meteorology. 104(2):143-155.
